title: Torre del Breny
description: A monumental Roman tomb of likely third century date located in the modern town of Castellgal√≠, between Barcelona and Manresa in Catalunya. Purportedly also known as the "Torre dels Dimonis" (Devil's Tower), it has no known ancient name.

properties.description: Polygonal geometry corresponding to the perimeter of the extant remains of the monument. Derived from an OpenStreetMap way.
properties.title: OSM Location
